t: Amazon Brand Registry: Eligibility, Enrollment, and Access
s: June 4, 2024 - On the Enroll your brand page, fill out required information for your brand, including your trademark details, brand name, logo, and product categories. You may need to upload supporting documents, such as a copy of your trademark registration certificate.

t: Create AI-optimized TV advertising campaigns with Brand+ | Amazon Ads
s: January 27, 2025 - Amazon Ads has introduced Brand+, a new AI-driven capability that helps brands reach more customers through streaming TV and online video advertising campaigns.

t: Brand+ and Performance+ Now Available in Amazon DSP Globally | Amazon Ads
s: March 21, 2025 - Amazon DSP introduces Brand+ and Performance+: AI-powered tools that simplify campaign management and optimize for your goals.

t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Brand Stores help build brand awareness by showcasing your brand and product catalog on your own Amazon web address. You can create a Brand Store at no additional cost—with no coding necessary.

t: Sponsored Brands – Increase brand awareness | Amazon Ads
s: Sponsored ads on Amazon help build your brand and drive sales. Invest in long-term business growth by advertising your brand and products on Amazon.

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon

t: Advertising your brand on Amazon: Create your advertising plan | Amazon Ads

t: r/AmazonSeller on Reddit: I took an interesting path to launch my brand on Amazon and I’m seeing huge success.. any tips on scaling?
What Is Amazon Brand Gating? (And How to Protect Your Sales With It)
s: Begin by creating a list of product ASINs you want to protect with Amazon brand gating. If you have an extensive product catalog, start with products that generate the most sales and have been targeted by counterfeit sellers before. You’ll then forward this document to your dedicated ...
